name: Benovative
tag_list: creativity, serious-game, social-game, open-innovation, social-network-marketing, talent-management
description: 4 a new generation game on creativity
overview:
Be-novative connects their players with companies through a creativity enhancing serious game where players go on challenges with their friends in developing real-life products and services. Be-novative is a Hungarian-American startup founded in 2011 July.

Enhancing Creativity

Be-novative is a game where you can develop your creative skills, generate new ideas with friends to create a positive change in whatever interest field you have: environment protection, healthcare, social challenges, high tech or entertainment. We are stepping into an era where new powers are emerging: creativity will be the key! Aweken your potentials while playing it alone or with your friends!

R&D Be-novative supports developing products and services of companies. We help any company to plan and monitor research and development and enrich their IP portfolio. With live contributions and ideas of the fresh mind R&D and Innovation becomes faster, closer to the needs of the society, more flexible and creative, which will generate more revenue and will create value.

Social Network Marketing Be-novative will boost up a new generation of social network marketing. You just play, create challenges, get its advantages and realize your potentials in the connection between people and companies.

Career Management 2.0 Talents can be found worldwide with Be-novative fast and simple interactively. Players gain self-knowledge by experimenting with ideation on different topics of creating a positive change through developing real-life products and services. Thus, career management will be based on self-knowledge, motivation and real talent for a field, thus recruiting becomes more focused and more effective.

Be-novative is going to be an application on social networks developed by the Be-novative team whose founders, Priszcilla Varnagy and Istvan Marhefka are Hungarian. Be-novative starts with Facebook as first. The app will be compatible with a desktop, laptop, most mobiles and tablets. Players will go on missions developing products and services solving challenges in developing real-life products and services. The game contains adventure and fun, but it also enhances creativity, self-knowledge, and possibilities for financial reward or increasing revenue.
